query.mssql: create table {0} ( [Number] int, [DocId] bigint, [TaskId] bigint, [AssignmentId] bigint, [TaskAuthor] nvarchar(max), [Performer] nvarchar(max), [Department] nvarchar(max), [Created] datetime, [Complated] datetime, [Result] nvarchar(max), [Comment] nvarchar(max), [ReportSessionId] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL )
